# <code>ignore</code> for core

<div class='command-title'>Ignore the output of the previous command in the pipeline</div>

## Signature

```> ignore```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Ignore the output of an echo command
```shell
  > echo done | ignore
```
